DOC.brief_summary: The primary object study evaluate safety tolerability single ascend intravenous ( IV ) subcutaneous ( SC ) dose REGN3500 healthy adult male female
DOC.brief_title: A Study Intravenously Subcutaneously Administered REGN3500 Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index < /= 33 kg/m2 In good health base medical history , physical examination , vital sign , laboratory test Normal electrocardiogram ( ECG ) blood pressure Able comply clinic visit studyrelated procedure Able sign inform consent Significant abnormalities hematology , clinical chemistry , urinalysis , medical history Current smoker recent history ( within 3 month ) History tuberculosis , HIV , hepatic disease Known sensitivity doxycycline ingredient study drug History multiple/severe allergies Pregnant breastfeed woman , currently use adequate contraception Participation another investigational drug study within 4 week
